column6: Xinjiang Joinworld Co., Ltd. is engaged in processing aluminum primarily in China. It also manufactures and sells electronic materials. The company's products include low, medium, and high voltage electrode aluminum foils; low, medium, and high voltage electronic aluminum foils; carbon products, such as aluminum electrolytic with prebaked anode, electrolytic anode paste, electrode paste, and cold ramming paste; structural materials products, including aluminum and other products that are primarily used in the production of windows and doors, curtain walls, and electrical machinery, as well as in transportation and aerospace fields. Its products also comprise high purity aluminum products, including high-purity aluminum wires, rods, ingots, and bars; refined aluminum; electrical round aluminum poles; and cast aluminum alloy ingots used in fields, such as building decoration materials processing, iron and steel smelting, power transmission parts processing, wire and cable processing, auto and commercial extrusion, mechanical and electrical products, mirror protection materials processing, electronics, defense, science and technology in aviation, aerospace, information equipment, etc. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Japan, Southeast Asia, and other countries. Xinjiang Joinworld Co., Ltd. is based in Urumqi, China.
column36: A statement by the company outlined that one of its reasons for establishing the plant is because Guinea has the largest bauxite resources in the world, with about 29 billion tons of the aluminum ore

column6: China Henan International Cooperation Group (CHICO) is a Chinese state-owned construction and engineering company held by the provincial government of Henan. The company was founded in 1983.

Radisson Hospitality, AB, is a hotel group. Originally founded in 1960 by Scandinavian conglomerate SAS Group as a hotel, it became a listed company in 2006. The global headquarters of Rezidor also relocated to Brussels, Belgium circa 1989. In 2005, Carlson also acquired 25% shares of Rezidor Hotel Group from SAS Group. Since 2007, SAS Group ceased to be a shareholder of the company. In 2010, Carlson Companies acquired the controlling influence (more than 50.1% shares) on the listed company. In 2012, Rezidor Hotel Group started to integrate with direct parent company, Carlson Hotels, which both companies would collectivity known as Carlson Rezidor Hotel Group. Carlson Hotels, Inc. and subsidiaries, including Rezidor Hotel Group, were sold to Chinese conglomerate HNA Group in 2016. However, in 2018, the CarlsonRezidor group was re-sold to a consortium led by Jin Jiang International Holdings. In 2018, Rezidor Hotel Group AB was renamed to Radisson Hospitality AB. The direct parent company, Carlson Hotels, Inc., had become Radisson Hospitality, Inc., the whole hotel group also had a new trading name Radisson Hotel Group. Radisson Hotel Group operates as a subsidiary of China-based Shanghai Jin Jiang International Hotels.
DERA Energy is engaged in renewable energy projects in Africa. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

Tebian Electric Apparatus (TBEA) is a China-based manufacturer of power transformers and other electrical equipment, and a developer of transmission projects. The company was established in 1978 is based in Changji, China.
